segments.text: I'm in 507 , and I have a big problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so sorry . Kindly tell me what the problem is , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Everywhere I look , I see cockroaches .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps you could look again , sir , to double-check .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The next cockroach I see will be number ten .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . Sandals , I've worked here five years without seeing one cockroach .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've already suffered enough without listening anymore to you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right , sir . Please let me transfer you to my supervisor
segments.speaker: S2
